oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forbrugere er villige til merpris for kyllinger med høj dyrevelfærd og fødevaresikkerhed
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Christensen, Tove
Denver, Sigrid
Mørkbak, Morten Raun
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic as well as non-organic consumers are willing to pay a price premium for animal welfare and food safety in when consuming chicken. Organic consumers are willing to pay a higher price premium than non-organic consumers. Also, organic consumers are willing to pay a price premium that exceeds the sum of price premiums for the individual characteristics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Christensen, Tove; Denver, Sigrid and Mørkbak, Morten Raun (2007) Forbrugere er villige til merpris for kyllinger med høj dyrevelfærd og fødevaresikkerhed. FOJOenyt, 2007.
